import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Row, Col } from 'antd' import Nav from '../component/Nav' import Content from '../component/Content' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { GET_ALL_STORE_AND_PRODUCT_SAGA, GET_ALL_STORE_SAGA } from '../redux/type/StoreType' export default function IndexPage() { const renderItem = () => { return JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('productOfStore')).map(item => { return

Toppings:

{item.toppings}

${item.price}

 }) } return (
